newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Soy shipping conditions at Brazil's Santos port.
newsitem.headline: Soy shipping conditions at Brazil's Santos port.

text.p: Santos port reported the following conditions for shipments of soybeans and soymeal:
Vessels: Ziemia Krakowska continues loading 19,000 tonnes soymeal. Tomis Future loading 50,000 tonnes soybeans.
Road: 303 trucks arrived Wednesday of which 292 were carrying soybeans and nine soymeal (the rest was citrus meal).
Rail: 39 wagons arrived Wednesday carrying soymeal.
